sf276:1.2:
At one time the Buddha was staying near Śrāvastī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.  


	
	
	
	



p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }
sf276:2.1:
p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }Now at
that time, the whole disk of the moon had been covered by the
demon-lord Rāhu.
sf276:3.1:
p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }
Then, when the disk of the moon glowed intensely red, that deity,
frightened, terrified and shocked, with hair standing on end,
approached the Blessed One.Having
approached and worshiped the Blessed One’s feet with his head, he
stood to one side.
sf276:4.1:
p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }Having
approached and worshipped the Blessed One’s feet with his head, he
stood to one side. Standing to one side, the deity addressed the
Blessed One in verse:
sf276:4.2:
p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }Homage
to the Buddha, the hero, liberated in every way,
I’ve gotten
into a tight situation, so be my refuge.
sf276:5.2: Buddhas have compassion for the world, so Rāhu will set free the Month.
sf276:6.1:
p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }The
Blessed One said:
sf276:7.1:
p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }The
moon dispels darkness, it is a giver of light which shines in the
sky, glowing pure white, 


	
	
	
	



p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }
sf276:7.2:
p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }but
Rāhu has eclipsed the Hare Marked One in the celestial region, that
light of humanity. Rāhu, release the moon at once!
sf276:8.2:
Then the disk of the moon was released in a hurry by the demon-lord
Rāhu.
sf276:8.3:
After that, hurrying, Rāhu let the moon go, his body
sweating; he was distressed, bewildered, as if in a swoon.
